NK041(di)040:1: // rgyud lung man ngag gi bshags pa'i tshig don cung
NK041(di)040:2: zad bshad pa dri med shel gyi me long zhes
NK041(di)040:4: rgyud lung man ngag gi bshags pa'i tshig gi don
NK041(di)040:5: cung zad bshad pa dri med shel gyi me long
NK041(di)040:6: zhes bya ba / bla ma dang gnyis su med
NK041(di)040:7: pa dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo
NK041(di)040:8: zhes bya ba / // rig stong gnyug ma sems kyi rdo rje ni //
NK041(di)040:9: 'khor 'das kun khyab rtag par bzhugs nyid la //
NK041(di)040:10: nges don 'jam dpal dpa' bo'i bdag nyid du //
NK041(di)040:11: mthong ba'i yid ches phyag gis rnam par 'dud //
NK041(di)040:12: dngos mtshan spros pa'i rnam pa kun bral yang //
NK041(di)040:13: 'od gsal dbyings las sna tshogs sgyu ma'i gar //
NK041(di)040:14: phyogs dang dus kyi mu mthar spro mdzad pa //
NK041(di)040:15: khyod min rigs rnams kun gyi byed po su //
NK041(di)040:16: khyod ni rtag tu mnyam pa'i chos nyid la //
NK041(di)040:17: kun rtog las rlung 'pho ba'i ngang tshul dang //
NK041(di)040:18: grub mtha'i zhe 'dod d+r+wa bas yang dang yang //
NK041(di)040:19: bsgribs par gyur gang de ni bshags bagyi'o //
NK041(di)040:20: 'dir dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las bcom
NK041(di)040:21: ldan 'das longs spyod kyi bdag po chen po rnams
NK041(di)040:22: kyis rgyud lung man ngag gi bshags pa gsungs pa
NK041(di)040:24: spyir zhing dang dus gzhan du 'byung bar dka' ba
NK041(di)040:25: rdo rje'i theg pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i lam gyi
NK041(di)040:26: gnad ni smin byed kyi dbang bzhi dang rjes su
NK041(di)040:27: 'brel ba'i lam rnam pa bzhi bsgom par 'du ste
NK041(di)040:28: / de yang snang ba yul gyi blo can rnams
NK041(di)040:29: kyi ngor byas nas snang srid dkyil 'khor gsum du
NK041(di)040:30: lta bas shes shing sgom pas nyams su len pa
NK041(di)040:31: bskyed pa ma h+aa yo ga ni bum dbang dang
NK041(di)040:32: 'brel ba'i lam snang stong zung 'jug nyid gtso bor
NK041(di)040:33: / ston la / ji ltar phyi rol gyi chos
NK041(di)040:34: thams cad nang gi rtsa rlung thig le'i 'pho ba'i
NK041(di)040:35: dbang gis yin par shes pa'i blo can rnams la
NK041(di)040:36: snod bcud thams cad bde stong gnyis su med pa'i
NK041(di)040:37: sras bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems su
NK041(di)040:38: sdom par byed pa rdzogs pa a nu yo ga
NK041(di)040:39: ni gsang sher gnyis dang rjes su 'brel ba'i lam
NK041(di)040:40: khyer gtso bor ston pa ste /
NK041(di)040:41: de yang gsang dbang gi lam gsal stong zung 'jug
NK041(di)040:42: ni a nu'i sngon 'gro rang lus thabs ldan dang
NK041(di)040:43: / sher dbang gi lam bde stong zung 'jug ni a nu'i lam gyi dngos gazhi'o //
NK041(di)040:44: nang rtsa rlung gi byed pa sogs la ma ltos
NK041(di)040:45: par gnyug ma'i ye shes rjen par mthong nus pa'i
NK041(di)040:46: rig pa rang snang gi blo can rnams kyi ngor
NK041(di)040:47: / 'khor 'das thams cad gzhir gnas gnyug ma'i ye
NK041(di)040:48: shes gcig pur la zlo ba rdzogs pa chen po
NK041(di)040:49: a ti yo ga ni dbang bzhi pa'i ye shes
NK041(di)040:50: rig stong zung 'jug nyid rtsal du 'don pa yin
NK041(di)040:51: pas ma h+aa dang a nu gnyis kyang rdzogs pa
NK041(di)040:52: chen por gzhol zhing 'bab pas theg pa thams cad
NK041(di)040:53: kyi skyel so ni rdzogs pa chen po kho nar
NK041(di)040:54: / nges so // des na sngags bla med thams
NK041(di)040:55: cad don du rim pa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor la
NK041(di)040:56: brten nas gzhi 'bras dbyer med zung 'jug gi ye
NK041(di)040:57: shes nyid lam du byed par 'dra yang /
NK041(di)040:58: snod bcud dkyil 'khor gsum du bstan pa rdo rje
NK041(di)040:59: theg pa spyi gnad ston pa rgyud ma h+aa yo
NK041(di)040:60: ga dang / phyi bskyed rim sogs tshegs chen po la mi ltos par /
NK041(di)040:61: nang gi rtsa rlung thig le'i byed pa khyad par
NK041(di)040:62: can la brten nas 'bras bu bde blag tu byed
NK041(di)040:63: pas na rgyud don gsal bar phye ba lta bu'i
NK041(di)040:64: lung a nu yo ga dang /
NK041(di)040:65: rtsa rlung gi byed pa sogs la'ang mi ltos par
NK041(di)040:66: rig stong gi ye shes rjen par 'char ba'i zab
NK041(di)040:67: mo'i gnad mthar thug pa ston pa man ngag rdzogs
NK041(di)040:69: gsum ka sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin par 'dra yang /
NK041(di)040:70: rgyud las rgyud don lung gi tshul gyis gsal por phye ba dang /
NK041(di)040:71: lung don man ngag gi gnad du brdeg pa lta
NK041(di)040:72: bu yin pas na rgyud lung man ngag gsum zhes
NK041(di)040:74: gzhi dngos po gshis kyi gnas tshul gtan la 'bebs
NK041(di)040:75: pa'i lam gyi gnad je bas je zab tu song
NK041(di)040:76: bas na / bden gnyis dbyer med kyi gnas lugs
NK041(di)040:77: la nges pa ji tsam rnyed pa de tsam du
NK041(di)040:78: lam gong ma gong ma la yid ches par 'gyur
NK041(di)040:79: bas na / ro // des na rdo rje theg
NK041(di)040:80: pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i spyi chings nang rgyud sde
NK041(di)040:81: gsum gyi dgongs pa dang bstun pa'i bshags tshul la
NK041(di)040:82: bas na / ro // gsum ste / rgyud ma h+aa ltar bshags pa /
NK041(di)040:83: lung a nu ltar bshags pa /
NK041(di)040:84: man ngag rdzogs chen ltar bshags pa gsum mo //
NK041(di)040:88: chos thams cad kyi chos nyid snang stong zung du
NK041(di)040:89: 'jug pa lhag pa'i bden pa dbyer med chos sku
NK041(di)040:90: chen po de la ni 'das sogs dus gsum gyi
NK041(di)040:91: mtshan ma'i spros pa thams cad med pa yin la
NK041(di)040:92: / de lta bur phyogs dus kyi dngos po mtshan
NK041(di)040:93: ma'i chos gang gi yang rang bzhin du mi gnas
NK041(di)040:95: yun can dmigs gtad kyi 'dzin rtog gang yang med pa'i so so rang rig pa'i ye shes kyis /
NK041(di)040:96: yul med rang gsal rjen par mthong nas /
NK041(di)040:97: dbyings stong pa nyid dang rig pa ye shes gnyis
NK041(di)040:98: ye nas gnyis su med pa mnyam nyid chos sku
NK041(di)040:99: chen po nyid du gnas pa las /
NK041(di)040:100: ma rtogs gnyis chos kyi snang ba gzugs sogs phyi'i skye mched yul dang /
NK041(di)040:101: mig sogs nang gi dbang po gnyis gnyis su med par rtogs pas bshags so zhes /
NK041(di)040:102: gang gis bshags na chos nyid spros med rtogs pa so so rang rig pa'i ye shes kyis /
NK041(di)040:103: gang du bshags na dbyings dang ye shes ye nas gnyis su med pa'i ngang du /
NK041(di)040:104: gang bshags na dbang yul gzung 'dzin gnyis snang gi rtog pa dang /
NK041(di)040:105: de'i dbang gis byung ba'i nyams chag dang las nyon thams cad /
NK041(di)040:106: tshul ji ltar bshags na ma spangs rang dag gi
NK041(di)040:107: tshul du rtogs pa tsam gyis rang grol du bshags
NK041(di)040:109: 'di ltar phyi snod kyi 'byung ba chen po lnga
NK041(di)040:110: ni rang bzhin gyis yum chen mo lnga'i bdag nyid
NK041(di)040:111: du bzhugs pa can gyi b+ha ga gang zhig dbyings
NK041(di)040:112: der ni rgyal ba rab 'byams kyi tshogs rtag tu
NK041(di)040:113: zag med kyi bde bas dgyes par gyur pa'i pho
NK041(di)040:114: brang du / nang bcud kyi sems can gyi phung
NK041(di)040:115: po lnga ni yab rgyal ba rigs lngar gnas pa
NK041(di)040:116: nyid kyi thabs rdo rje bde ba'i bdag nyid ye
NK041(di)040:117: nas gnyis su med par rol pa bde chen byang
NK041(di)040:118: chub sems kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa ste /
NK041(di)040:119: de ltar na thabs dang shes rab ye nas 'du 'bral med par gyur pa la /
NK041(di)040:120: phya dang nang gi dngos po ltar snang ba'i snod
NK041(di)040:121: dang bcud kyi rnam pa 'di dag kyang don la
NK041(di)040:122: gnyis su med par gnas pa la de ltar rtogs
NK041(di)040:123: pa'i sgo nas bshags so zhes /
NK041(di)040:124: thabs shes gnyis med du rtogs pa'i lam gyis nyams chag ma spangs rang dag tu bshags pa'o //
NK041(di)040:126: de ltar bden gnyis dbyer med du gnas pa de nyid gtan la phab nas /
NK041(di)040:127: dbyings stong cha gtso bor gtan la 'bebs pa'i rnal 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin dang /
NK041(di)040:128: snang cha sku dang ye shes gtso bor lam du
NK041(di)040:129: byed pa kun snang dang rgyu'i ting 'dzin gnyis te
NK041(di)040:130: / de yang gzhan don phrin las kyi rgyu snying rje chen po dang /
NK041(di)040:131: de las gang 'dod sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i bkod pa ston pa'i rgyu rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
NK041(di)040:132: de ltar ting 'dzin rnam pa gsum gyis thog med
NK041(di)040:133: nas goms pa'i dngos zhen dang 'grogs pa rang rgyud
NK041(di)040:134: kyi blo yi gdar sha bcad de ji ltar 'khyags
NK041(di)040:135: rom chu bo la zhu ba bzhin du snod bcud
NK041(di)040:136: dkyil 'khor gsum du rtogs goms mthar dbyung nas /
NK041(di)040:139: rnam shes dang yul dang dbang po rnams sems dpa' sems ma sogs te /
NK041(di)040:140: mdor na snang srid thams cad lha dang lha mo'i
NK041(di)040:141: dkyil 'khor du lta bas rtogs shing yin la yin
NK041(di)040:142: pa'i tshul du ting 'dzin gyis gsal ba rab kyi
NK041(di)040:143: mthar thug par bsgomas nas rnam par smin pa la
NK041(di)040:144: sogs pa'i rig 'dzin gyi go 'phang rim gyis bgrod
NK041(di)040:145: de / 'di ltar snang ba'i 'gro drug sems can
NK041(di)040:146: thams cad rang bzhin gyis rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du
NK041(di)040:147: de / / gnyis su med par ye nas lhun
NK041(di)040:148: gyis grub par gnas pa nyid rtsol ba'i dbang gis
NK041(di)040:149: ngan pa bzang por bsgyur ba lta bu min par
NK041(di)040:150: ye nas gnyis su med pa nyid mngon du gyur
NK041(di)040:151: par mdzod cig ces gzhi 'bras dbyer med du bstan
NK041(di)040:152: de / / pa'o // gnyis pa lung ltar bshags pa la'ang gzhi lam 'bras gsum las /
NK041(di)040:153: dang po phra ba'i lus ngag yid gsum du grags pa /
NK041(di)040:154: gtso mo gsum dang 'khor lo lnga la sogs pa'i
NK041(di)040:155: rtsa dang srog ste rtsa ba dang yan lag gi
NK041(di)040:156: rlung dang / tsit+ta ni snying po ste rtsa dang
NK041(di)040:157: rlung la brten nas sems kyi rten du gyur pa'i
NK041(di)040:158: rlung dang / thig le dang / de gsum gyi
NK041(di)040:159: byed pa la brten nas rags pa'i lus ngag yid
NK041(di)040:162: gsang ba'i gsang ba chen po zhes 'jig rten phal
NK041(di)040:163: pa rnams lta ci nyan rang la sogs pas phyogs
NK041(di)040:164: tsam mi shes pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs mi
NK041(di)040:165: zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo nyid kyi mdzod du
NK041(di)040:167: 'di ltar lus rtsa khams sku yi rdo rje yin te /
NK041(di)040:168: 'di dag rang bzhin gyis snang stong gnyug ma'i de nyid du gnas pa'i phyir /
NK041(di)040:169: de bzhin du ngag rlung khams grags stong gsung gi rdo rje /
NK041(di)040:170: yid thig le gsal stong thugs kyi rdo rjer gnas
NK041(di)040:171: kyang de ltar mi shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi
NK041(di)040:172: ngor rang bzhin gyis gab cing sbas pa ltar gyur
NK041(di)040:173: pas na gsang ba'i gsang ba zhes so //
NK041(di)040:174: de ltar na phra rags kyi sgo gsum po gnyug
NK041(di)040:175: ma'i gsang ba gsum dang dbyer med par bzhugs pas
NK041(di)040:176: na / de dag gi snang cha bde ba kun tu bzang po dang /
NK041(di)040:177: stong cha dbyings kun tu bzang mo nyid gnyis su
NK041(di)040:178: med pa sras bde chen byang chub kyi sems ye
NK041(di)040:179: shes rdo rje'am rang byung gi ye shes gcig nyid
NK041(di)040:180: la ldog cha'i dbye bas ye shes lnga dang mtha'
NK041(di)040:181: grol ye shes la sogs pa bzhis phye bas mi
NK041(di)040:182: shigs pa rdo rje ye shes kyi klong dgu yi
NK041(di)040:183: rol pa dpal chen he ru ka dgur shar ba
NK041(di)040:184: dang / ma dag pa'i skabs na bsam gtan bzhi
NK041(di)040:185: gzugs med bzhi 'dod pa ste khamsa gsum gyi sa
NK041(di)040:186: dgu po gnyis gnyis su meda par bshags zhes /
NK041(di)040:187: 'khor 'das dbyer med du lta bas bshags so //
NK041(di)040:189: sus kyang bcos bsgyur med par rang bzhin gyis ji
NK041(di)040:190: ltar snang ba thams cad lha yi dkyil 'khor du
NK041(di)040:192: lha'i snying po tsam zhig brjod pas sad par byas
NK041(di)040:193: te lha'i sku mchog yongs su rdzogs par gsal zhing
NK041(di)040:194: mnyam la ma 'dres pa'i tshul du byas te /
NK041(di)040:195: de yang bde stong dbyer med pa mnyam nyid ngo bo nyid kyi sku /
NK041(di)040:196: de nyid du rtogs goms rtsal rdzogs par byas pas
NK041(di)040:197: 'khor 'das dbyer med du rtogs pas na ye nas
NK041(di)040:198: nyams chag gi sgrib pas gol par mi 'gyur ba'i
NK041(di)040:199: sngags kyi thabsa zab mo la mkhas pas srid zhi
NK041(di)040:200: gnyis su med par nyams grib thams cad ma spangs
NK041(di)040:201: rang dag gi tshul du bshags zhes so //
NK041(di)040:202: gsum pa 'bras bu phyi dang nang gi snod dang
NK041(di)040:203: bcud du snang ba rnams gnyis su med pa chos
NK041(di)040:205: sems can du 'dzin pa'i yul gang zag gi bdag gam nga dang /
NK041(di)040:206: de las gzhan pa'i chos sna tshogs kyi bdag gi
NK041(di)040:207: ngo bo nyid ma grub pas de gnyis rang bzhin
NK041(di)040:208: mnyam pa nyid du mnyam par gnas pa nyid rtogs
NK041(di)040:209: shing goms pas / rnal 'byor gyi lam lnga po
NK041(di)040:210: mthar phyin nas mtho ris dang ngan song gi 'khor
NK041(di)040:212: 'bras bu sdug bsngal gyi chos rnam pa gnyis po
NK041(di)040:213: ste mdor na kun nyon 'khor bas bsdus pa thams
NK041(di)040:214: cad / gnyis meda bde ba chen po'i klong du
NK041(di)040:215: ma spangs rang sar dag ste 'bras bu mthar phyin
NK041(di)040:217: gsum pa man ngag ltar bshags pa la /
NK041(di)040:219: de ltar bshags pa'i phan yon bstan pa gnyis /
NK041(di)040:220: dang po la gzhi lam 'bras bu ltar bshags pa gsum las /
NK041(di)040:221: dang po snang zhing srid pas bsdus pa'i chos ji ltar snang ba 'di dag thams cad ni /
NK041(di)040:222: spyod yul thams cad du ma dag pa med pa'i
NK041(di)040:223: kun tu bzang po rnam par rtog pa'i 'gyur ba'i
NK041(di)040:224: zug rngu thams cad dang bral ba'i bde ba chen
NK041(di)040:226: de ni yod med rtag chad la sogs pa'i mtha'
NK041(di)040:227: 'di dang 'di lta bu'o zhes yid kyis dmigs nas
NK041(di)040:228: mtshan ma'i spyod yul can gyi tshig gi lam las
NK041(di)040:229: 'das pa'i rang bzhin du gnas na yang /
NK041(di)040:230: 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis bcos bsgyur med par bzhugs
NK041(di)040:231: pa'i gnas lugs de lta bu ma rtogs nas 'khor
NK041(di)040:232: 'das spang gnyen sogs su lta ba'i dbang gis byed
NK041(di)040:233: rtsol sna tshogs kyi g.yo bas chos nyid la sgrib
NK041(di)040:234: par gyur pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de nyid
NK041(di)040:235: / rtog pas bcos shing gnyen po gzhan gyis spong ba lta bu min par /
NK041(di)040:236: ma spangs rang grol du rtogs pa'i klong du bshags zhes /
NK041(di)040:237: gnas tshul la spang gnyen 'dag grol med pa'i chos nyid mnyam pa chen por gnas pas na /
NK041(di)040:238: kun tu rtog pa'i blos spang bya dang gnyen po
NK041(di)040:239: sogs su lta ba'ang gnas lugs kyi don mthong ba
NK041(di)040:240: la sgrib pa yin par shes nas /
NK041(di)040:241: gnas lugs thob shor med par mnyam par bzhag pa
NK041(di)040:242: 'di bshags pa thams cad kyi rgyal po yin te
NK041(di)040:244: drang por 'dug la yang dag ltos //
NK041(di)040:245: 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
NK041(di)040:246: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK041(di)040:248: chos nyid de ni dus gsum po kun tu'ang rang gi ngang tshul las mi g.yo bas na /
NK041(di)040:249: 'pho zhing 'gyur ba med cing de ji lta ba
NK041(di)040:250: bzhin du mtshon par byed pa'i barda'am tha tshig btagsa
NK041(di)040:252: de'i rang bzhin ye nas de ltar yin pa la /
NK041(di)040:253: da blo yis de la rtsol ba med cing lam
NK041(di)040:254: gyis bsgrub tu med pas nam mkha'i ngang lta bu
NK041(di)040:256: rang bzhin gyis 'khor 'das yongsa la khyab pas 'khor
NK041(di)040:257: 'das kun gyis 'dod rgur bsgyur ba yin pa ni
NK041(di)040:258: 'di ltar / rnam pa thams cad du ji byas
NK041(di)040:259: cir snang yang de'i ngang tshul las su yang mi
NK041(di)040:260: 'da' bar gnas pa kho na yin pas /
NK041(di)040:261: da cung zad kyang sgrub cing rtsol ba mi dgos te /
NK041(di)040:262: thams cad nam mkha'i ngang du rol zhing rgyu ba bzhin no //
NK041(di)040:263: des na bdag tu 'dzin pa sogs phyin ci log
NK041(di)040:264: gi rtog pa thams cad kyang bcos bsgyur med par
NK041(di)040:265: rang bzhin gyis byang chub chen po nyid kyi lam
NK041(di)040:266: las gzhan min pa nyid du shes pas bshags zhes
NK041(di)040:267: pa ste / 'dir byang chub dang de'i lam zhes
NK041(di)040:268: rgyu 'bras tha dad du ston pa ma yin kyang
NK041(di)040:269: pa ste / / phyin ci log de dag gi
NK041(di)040:270: rang bzhin rtogs na phyin ci log nyid ma spangs
NK041(di)040:271: par rang grol bas na byang chub kyi lam zhes
NK041(di)040:272: gsungs te tshul 'di dang mtshungs par zab mo'i mdo
NK041(di)040:274: nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub rdo rje'i gzhi lags so //
NK041(di)040:276: des na tshul 'dir bshags bya lam gyi mi mthun
NK041(di)040:277: phyogs dang bshags byed gnyen po tha dad du lta
NK041(di)040:278: ba ni / spang bya rang bzhin gyis ma grub
NK041(di)040:279: pa la der lta ba nam mkhas skrag pa bzhin
NK041(di)040:280: du blo dman pa'i snang tshul yin pas na 'dir
NK041(di)040:281: ma spangs ye dag tu rtogs pas /
NK041(di)040:282: lam dang lam min rang bzhin mnyam par shes pa
NK041(di)040:283: ni lam bya rtsol med pa'i rnal 'byor te ches
NK041(di)040:286: de ltar snang srid bde ba chen por gnas pa la rtsol sgrub cung zad mi dgos te /
NK041(di)040:287: gang rtsol bas bsgrub pa dang grub mtha' dman pa'i
NK041(di)040:288: zhe 'dod sna tshogs ni don la 'ching ba yin
NK041(di)040:289: te de ma zad bar du grol ba mthar thug
NK041(di)040:290: pa mi thob kyang rang gnas kyi chos sku rang
NK041(di)040:291: sor ngo 'phrod pa'am rtogsa par byed pa'i man ngag
NK041(di)040:292: dang rtogs bya'i don zung du mi ldan pa ste
NK041(di)040:294: gnas lugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsal bzhag med
NK041(di)040:295: pa'i don la rang nyid yid ches gdeng du ma
NK041(di)040:296: gyur na / tshig gis mtshon par byas nas rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas so //
NK041(di)040:297: lam bsgrub tu med do zhes pa la sogs pa'i
NK041(di)040:298: tshul du sems kyi spyod yul la gnas pa'i grub
NK041(di)040:299: mtha'i zhe 'dod sna tshogs kyis dkris pas ni sems
NK041(di)040:300: las 'das pa'i ye shes la chos rnams kyi chos
NK041(di)040:301: nyid mngon du gyur pa'i byang chub chen po mi
NK041(di)040:302: 'thob ste / de ltar na tshig tsam dang blos byas sems kyi rnyog pas ma bslad par /
NK041(di)040:303: rang sems ye nas bsal bzhag med pa'i sangs rgyas
NK041(di)040:304: yin par shes nas rtsol sgrub spang gnyen du grub
NK041(di)040:305: par 'dzin pa'i shes sgrib phra mo la lam du
NK041(di)040:306: mi rlom par / gzhir gnas gnyug ma'i don la rang babs su bzhag pas /
NK041(di)040:307: gzung 'dzin gyi spyod yul can gyi sems las 'das
NK041(di)040:308: pa'i rang byung ye shes chen po'i klong du lam
NK041(di)040:309: mthar phyin te zad sar 'khyol bar shog cig ces
NK041(di)040:310: gsungs te / zab mo'i mdo sde las kyang /
NK041(di)040:311: sems rtogs na ye shes yin pas sangs rgyas gzhan
NK041(di)040:312: du mi btsal ba'i 'du shes rab tu bsgom par
NK041(di)040:314: gnyis pa tshul de ltar nyams grib thams cad ye
NK041(di)040:315: nas ma spangs rang dag tu rtogs pas bshags na
NK041(di)040:316: / bshags pa thams cad kyi rgyal por gyur pa ste /
NK041(di)040:317: 'dis ni 'khor gsum gyi rnam par rtog pa shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad dang /
NK041(di)040:318: nyon mongs pa dang las ngan pa ste /
NK041(di)040:319: mdor na sgrib pa gnyis dang de'i dbang gis las
NK041(di)040:320: bsags pa thams cad ma spangs rang sar dag nas
NK041(di)040:321: 'bras bu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'thob
NK041(di)040:322: bo zhes 'khor gyi nang du mi 'jigs pa seng
NK041(di)040:323: ge'i sgra bsgrags pa'i tshul gyis /
NK041(di)040:324: bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi chos kun la mnga'
NK041(di)040:325: dbang 'byor ba'i longs spyod kyi bdag po chen po
NK041(di)040:326: rnams kyis man ngag rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor
NK041(di)040:327: ltar bshags pa yin no zhes so //
NK041(di)040:328: de ltar rgyud dang lung dang man ngag gi //
NK041(di)040:329: tshul dang mthun par bshags pa'i rim pa ni //
NK041(di)040:330: rdo rje'i tshig gi don zab rtogs dka' yang //
NK041(di)040:331: bla ma'i dka' yis cung zad phye ste bshad //
NK041(di)040:332: de yi dge bas mtha' yas 'gro ba kun //
NK041(di)040:333: dngos dang dngos med spros pa'i d+r+wa ba las //
NK041(di)040:334: rab 'das mkha' khyab mkha' yi rdo rje'i sku //
NK041(di)040:335: sgrib bral rdo rje sems dpa'i sku thob shog /
NK041(di)040:336: ces pa 'adi'ang bdag cag gi 'dren mchog mtshungs med
NK041(di)040:337: a b+ha ya d+harmen+d+ra'i zhal snga nas bkra shis pa'i
NK041(di)040:338: lha reg dang dngul dkar gyi me long bcas ched
NK041(di)040:339: du bskul ba'i gsung gnang ba de ma thag tu
NK041(di)040:340: tshig don la bka' 'dri zhus pa bzhin bshad lung
NK041(di)040:341: zhig kyang gnang ba'i bka' drin la brten nas a
NK041(di)040:342: dzi ta bi dzas rang blos gang dpog cung zad
NK041(di)040:343: rnam par bshad pa dge legs su gyur cig //
